summary: Created vendor gift-card view page, retail create/edit/view pages, loyalty create/edit/view pages, and finance/badge/subscription details pages following Rental module patterns. Updated all index pages to match Rental module design with proper headers, search forms, and action buttons. Added corresponding controller methods and routes for all new pages.
current_status: Completed all vendor pages for gift-card, retail, loyalty, finance, badge, and subscription. Next: Continue with remaining admin pages and design fixes for all pages to ensure complete consistency with Rental module.
